oracleTableProperties:
TABLESPACE {{tablespace}}
PCTUSED	0
PCTFREE	10
INITRANS	1
MAXTRANS	255
STORAGE	(
		INITIAL	80K
		NEXT	80K
		MINEXTENTS	1
		MAXEXTENTS	UNLIMITED
		PCTINCREASE	0
		BUFFER_POOL	DEFAULT
		)
NOLOGGING
NOCOMPRESS
NOCACHE
NOPARALLEL
MONITORING

targetSystems.name: Oracle
targetSystems.linkTemplate:
CREATE TABLE {{schema}}.{{tableName}} (
 {{hashKeyName}} {{hashKeyDataType}} NOT NULL,
 {{loadDateName}} {{loadDateDataType}} NOT NULL,
{{#if lastSeen}}{{lastSeenName}} {{lastSeenDataType}},{{#/if}}
 {{recordSourceName}} {{recordSourceDataType}} NOT NULL,
{{#each reference}}{{name}} {{dataType}} {{#if notNull}}NOT NULL{{/#if}}{{/#each}})
{{tableProperties}};
targetSystems.satelliteTemplate:
CREATE TABLE {{schema}}.{{tableName}} (
 {#each reference}}[{{name}} {{dataType}} NOT NULL,{{/#each}}
 {{loadDateName}} {{loadDateDataType}} NOT NULL,
{{#if lastSeen}}{{lastSeenName}} {{lastSeenDataType}},
{{/#if}} {{recordSourceName}} {{recordSourceDataType}} NOT NULL,
{{#each field}}{{name}} {{dataType}} {{#if notNull}}NOT NULL{{/#if}}{{/#each}})
{{tableProperties}};

targetSystems.name: SAP Hana
SQL Server
targetSystems.headerTemplate:
/**
* created from the Data Vault Model {{modelName}}
* on {{generationDate}}
**/


USE [{{database}}]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER IN
GO

SET ANSI_PADDING ON
GO
targetSystems.hubTemplate:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[{{tableName}}] (
 [{{hashKeyName}}] [{{hashKeyDataType}}] NOT NULL,
 [{{loadDateName}}] [{{loadDateDataType}}] NOT NULL,
{{#if lastSeen}}[{{lastSeenName}}] [{{lastSeenDataType}}],{{/#if}}
 [{{recordSourceName}}] [{{recordSourceDataType}}] NOT NULL,
{{#each businessKey}}[{{name}}] [{{dataType}}] {{#if notNull}}NOT NULL{{/#if}}{{/each})
CONSTRAINT [PK_{{tableName}}] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED
(	[{{hashKeyName}}] ASC
) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 90, DATA_COMPRESSION = PAGE) ON [{{dataset}}]
targetSystems.linkTemplate:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[{{tableName}}] (
 [{{hashKeyName}}] [{{hashKeyDataType}}] NOT NULL,
 [{{loadDateName}}] [{{loadDateDataType}}] NOT NULL,
{{#if lastSeen}}[{{lastSeenName}}] [{{lastSeenDataType}}],{{/#if}}
 [{{recordSourceName}}] [{{recordSourceDataType}}] NOT NULL,
{{#each reference}}[{{name}}] [{{dataType}}] {{#if notNull}}NOT NULL{{/#if}}{{/each})
CONSTRAINT [PK_{{tableName}}] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED
(	[{{hashKeyName}}] ASC
) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 90, DATA_COMPRESSION = PAGE) ON [{{dataset}}]
targetSystems.satelliteTemplate:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[{{tableName}}] (
 {{#each reference}}[{{name}}] [{{dataType}}] NOT NULL,{{/#each}}
 [{{loadDateName}}] [{{loadDateDataType}}] NOT NULL,
{{#if lastSeen}}{{[lastSeenName]}} [{{lastSeen}}],
{{/#if}}] {{[recordSourceName]}} [{{recordSourceType}}] NOT NULL,
 [{{hashDiff}}] [{{hashkeyDataType}}],
{{#each field}} [{{name}}] [{{dataType}}]{{#if notNull}} NOT NULL,{{/#if}}{{/#each}}
 [{{loadDateName}}] [{{loadDateDataType}}] NOT NULL,
{{#if lastSeen}}[{{lastSeenName}}] [{{lastSeenDataType}}],{{/#if}}
 [{{recordSourceName}}] [{{recordSourceDataType}}] NOT NULL,
{{#each reference}}[{{name}}] [{{dataType}}] {{#if notNull}}NOT NULL{{/#if}}{{/each})
CONSTRAINT [PK_{{tableName}}] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED
(	[{{hashKeyName}}] ASC, [{{loadDateName}}] ASC 
) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 90, DATA_COMPRESSION = PAGE) ON [{{dataset}}]
